overall.description: Construct an array by repeating A the number of times given by reps.

reps.description: The number of repetitions of A along each axis.

note: If A.ndim < d, A is promoted to be d-dimensional by prepending new axes. So a shape (3,) array is promoted to (1, 3) for 2-D replication, or shape (1, 1, 3) for 3-D replication. If this is not the desired behavior, promote A to d-dimensions manually before calling this function. '
